content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Mar 2019I'm planning for retirement in the next few years. What are some suitable alternative investments?1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Mar 2019It depends on your risk appetite and your age. SSBs, bonds, CPF and high interest savings account are good for people who dont want take too much risk. You can also use stocks and REITS as well but they will be more volatile.0 comments0
